       <mat-card-actions fxLayout="row" fxLayoutAlign="end center">
 
-        <button mat-raised-button color="primary" class="new-product-button" type="button">
+        <!-- Show the button only on screens wider than 600px -->
+        <button mat-raised-button color="primary" class="new-product-button" type="button" fxShow.gt-sm>
           <mat-icon>add_circle_outline</mat-icon> New Product
         </button>
       
+        <!-- Hide the button on screens 600px and below -->
+        <button mat-mini-fab color="primary" class="new-product-button" type="button" fxHide.gt-sm>
+          <mat-icon>add_circle_outline</mat-icon>
+        </button>
+
